name: yaoya_kandabashi
description: 買い物先に行ったら、欲しい物が売ってねぇ…。

scripts.setup0: npm install && npm install --prefix front && npm install --prefix back && npm run migrate --prefix back && npm run seed --prefix back
scripts.setup: npm install && npm install --prefix front && npm install --prefix back && npm run migrate --prefix back  && npm run seed --prefix back
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix front" "npm run startmon --prefix back"
